short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tries to reduce the strain by constant covid news and spam on social networks which can lead to panic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The content filtered is not deleted but instead blurred out so you can still choose to see it by hovering over it.

Platforms currently supported:
Twitter
Reddit
Google Search (news cards & results)
